products.title: Horizon Golden Sand Roman Blind

The graduated ombre print creates a border pattern at the bottom of the fabric that's incredibly modern and on trend. The subtle use of colour allows you to incorporate this blind a gorgeous sunny blend of golden neutrals makes this horizon blind really stand out from the crowd.
